text_block_list.text:
It had been a few days since I had become a 
Pro Trainer at Tracen Academy. Today, too, 
I hadn't found an Uma Musume to be in charge of.

If you slouch like that, won't it make the other party uneasy? 
It's fine if you have more self-confidence.
text_block_list.name: Sensei

text_block_list.text:
The former trainer who has been mentoring me since I 
started aiming to be a Pro Trainer, tried consoling me.

You've been saying it for a long time, that you want 
to help an Uma Musume aim for their dream, right? 
That's why I've had such high expetations of you.
text_block_list.name: Sensei

text_block_list.text:
……even seeing me in such a pathetic state, 
Sensei still said he had such expectations of me. 
There was not even a glimmer of doubt in his eyes.
If you're fine with me, then I'd be glad to!

Thanks alot, Top Ro-senpai! I really admire senpai's straight-
forward running……I'm sorry for asking something unreasonable!
text_block_list.name: Kouhai Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
It's fine! I'm not sure if there's really anything you can learn 
from my running……but I'll show you as many times as you want.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
If you have any questions, I'll answer them afterwards, okay? 
There's no need to hold back. Well then, let's get to it――
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: Haaa- haa haa haa haa haa!
text_block_list.name: T M Opera O

text_block_list.text:
It seems the Goddess of Fate has bound us together. 
Come now, let us take to the stage!
text_block_list.name: T M Opera O

text_block_list.text:
Even without the curtain rising, an etude resounds! 
Is that not so, Ayabe-san!?
text_block_list.name: T M Opera O

text_block_list.text:
……I have no idea what you're talking about. 
Stop trying to get me involved.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
Opera O-chan and Ayabe-san! Looks like both 
of you are training too. What a coincidence!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Eeh, eeh……that means we'll get to see all 3 of you run!? 
Thank you very much! I'm looking forward to it.
text_block_list.name: Kouhai Uma Musume

text_block_list.text: Like I said, don't――
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: An outstanding proposal!!!!!
text_block_list.name: T M Opera O

text_block_list.text: Wai-……
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
Fufuu. Since we have the chance, let's do some parallel running! 
They'll definitely be able to learn more, I think.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: But……if we're doing this, I won't lose!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
At those words, the look in T M Opera O 
and Admire Vega's eyes changed.

Excuse me, the Trainer-san over there! 
Would you mind handling the starting signal!?
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
These 3 were all Uma Musume at the academy that were 
the center of many rumors. Narita Top Road and Admire 
Vega, especially, were getting alot of attention.

At the same time as the starting signal, 
there were the sounds of strong kicks in the turf.

The ground is in good condition……! 
With this, there should be no problems!!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: Haaaaa……!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
The moment we shine brightest, is something I know……! 
Let it ring out, a song, a prelude from the ensemble!
text_block_list.name: T M Opera O

text_block_list.text:
……Haa……! 
Move……out of the way……!
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
! Opera O-chan, Ayabe-san……! 
……I'm still……not done yet……!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaaaaa!!
text_block_list.name: All 3

text_block_list.text:
T M Opera O and Admire Vega both ran splendidly. 
Both of them had their own unique appeal.
However, the one that really caught my eye was――
Narita Top Road……!

She had a strong form with a long stride. 
It was a running style that relied on her speed.

I didn't feel any hesitation in her running that sought 
to take the lead. It was almost like she was screaming 
that the path ahead, her future, was shining brightly――

……it was exciting. Countless possible training menus came 
to mind, as if my heart was telling me to move forward.

Huuu-……what a good feeling! Fufuu, it was an unexpected 
chance for parallel running, but it was fun~!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
The kouhai were really fired up too~. Next time, so I can 
show them an even more amazing run, I need to keep training!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
――Ah, Trainer-san.  
Thank you for handling the starting signal earlier!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
It was difficult to change yourself so suddenly. 
I still couldn't proudly call myself a Pro Trainer, yet.

But, I should be sincere and tell her 
straight-forwardly, just like her run.
choice_data_list: I'm looking to scout an Uma Musume
I'm looking to scout an Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
Ah, so that's why! 
Then, does that mean you're a new trainer?
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Oooh-! It's pretty nerve-wracking at the start, huh……! 
When I first came to Tracen Academy, I was really nervous too!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
When I was growing up, the coach that was taking 
care of me, talked alot about Tracen Academy, 
so when I got in it was really……really amazing!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Ah! Um, is there anything I can help with? 
If there's someone you want to talk to, I can go get them.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
In that case, there was something I wanted to ask her. 
I took a deep breath and stood straight.
choice_data_list: Is there a dream you're aiming for?
Is there a dream you're aiming for?

text_block_list.text:
Eh? My dream, is it? Now that I think about it, 
this might be the first time I've put it in to words.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: I want to――live up to everyone's expectations!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Yeah! My family and friends, kouhai…… 
everyone that's cheering for me. And also――
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
If there are Uma Musume that view me as a rival, then I 
want to be able to run in a way that won't disappoint them.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: I want to be able to live up to those expectations!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
It wasn't an unusual answer. However, I wonder why. 
Compared to anyone before, it strongly――resounded within me.
I took another deep breath, looking directly at Narita Top Road.
choice_data_list: I want to help with that dream
I want to help with that dream

text_block_list.text: Eh……does that mean……
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
choice_data_list: I want to be your trainer
I want to be your trainer

text_block_list.text:
A-are you okay with that!? 
Wah, I'm looking forward to it!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: Would I be rejected again? But, I had still wanted to say it――
Eh?
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
We ended up just staring at each other, 
an awkward silence between us……
